languages.text: Вышли братья и сестры Ордена Молота к чужакам, и несли они воду и протеиновые яства, целебные травы от хворей и кувшины с прометием. Но свара из-за снеди случилась промеж пришлыми, и пролилася кровь, и началось толпотворение, и многие были затоптаны и растерзаны, в числе же их и насельники монастыря.

The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.
languages.original_text: Вышли братья и сестры Ордена Молота к чужакам, и несли они воду и протеиновые яства, целебные травы от хворей и кувшины с прометием. Но свара из-за снеди случилась промеж пришлыми, и пролилася кровь, и началось толпотворение, и многие были затоптаны и растерзаны, в числе же их и насельники монастыря.

traits.locale_text: The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

Unarmed and unarmoured, the brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. They shared generously with the guests, but they were too few and the strangers, too many.

The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

Unarmed and unarmoured, the brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. They shared generously with the guests, but they were too few and the strangers too many.

The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

languages.text: Los hermanos y hermanas de la Orden del Martillo salieron al encuentro de los forasteros llevando agua, vituallas cargadas de proteínas, hierbas medicinales y jarros de prometio. Pero los víveres se convirtieron en motivo de disputa entre la multitud: se derramó sangre y muchos acabaron aplastados y malheridos en la estampida, incluyendo a algunos habitantes del monasterio.
languages.original_text: The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

traits.locale_text: Sin armas ni armaduras, los hermanos de la Orden del Martillo salieron al encuentro de los forasteros llevando agua, vituallas cargadas de proteínas y hierbas medicinales y jarros de prometio. Compartieron generosamente sus víveres con sus visitantes, pero ellos eran pocos y los visitantes demasiados.

languages.text: 重锤修会的修士与修女们带着水、蛋白质食品、药草，以及一壶壶的钷素，前来迎接这些陌生人。然而，人群为了争夺补给品而大打出手，血流成河。许多人在混乱中受了伤，还有的人被慌乱的人群踩踏，其中不乏修道院的成员。
languages.original_text: The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

traits.locale_text: 圣锤修会的修士与修女们没有携带任何武装，而是带着水、蛋白质食品、药草，以及一壶壶的钷素，前来迎接这些陌生人。他们慷慨地与外来者们分享他们的资源，但资源太少，外来者太多。

languages.text: 鉄槌の修道会の修道士達は、見知らぬ訪問者に会おうと姿を見せた。その手には水とタンパク質の食料、薬草、プロメチウムの水入れを持っていた。しかし、訪問者たちは食糧を巡って争いあった。ちなが慣れ、多くの者が暴動の中で踏みつけにされ、引き裂かれた。被害者の中には修道院の人間もいた。
languages.original_text: The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

traits.locale_text: 鉄槌の修道会の修道士達は、見知らぬ訪問者に会おうと姿を見せた。その手には水とタンパク質の食料、薬草、プロメチウムの水入れを持っていた。しかし、訪問者たちは食糧を巡って争いあった。ちなが慣れ、多くの者が暴動の中で踏みつけにされ、引き裂かれた。被害者の中には修道院の人間もいた。

languages.text: Die Brüder und Schwestern des Ordens des Hammers traten vor die Fremden und reichten ihnen Wasser, proteinreiche Kost, medizinische Kräuter und Krüge mit Promethium. Doch die Menge prügelten sich um Lebensmittel, Blut floss, und es kam zur Panik, bei der viele zertrampelt oder verstümmelt wurden, darunter auch einige Klosterbewohner.
languages.original_text: The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

traits.locale_text: Unbewaffnet und bar jeder Rüstung traten die Brüder und Schwestern des Ordens des Hammers vor die Fremden und reichten ihnen Wasser, proteinreiche Kost, medizinische Kräuter und Krüge mit Promethium. Sie teilten großzügig mit ihren Gästen, waren aber nur wenige und die Fremden zu zahlreich.

languages.text: Les frères et sœurs de l'Ordre du Marteau viennent à la rencontre des étrangers, les bras chargés d'eau et de victuailles protéinées, d'herbes médicinales et de jarres de prométhium. Mais la foule en vient aux mains pour de la viande et le sang coule. Beaucoup sont piétinés ou mutilés dans la cohue, et parmi les victimes se trouvent des résidents du monastère.
languages.original_text: The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

traits.locale_text: Sans armes ni armures, les frères et sœurs de l'Ordre du Marteau viennent à la rencontre des étrangers, les bras chargés d'eau et de victuailles protéinées, d'herbes médicinales et de jarres de prométhium. Ils distribuent généreusement leurs bienfaits à la ronde, mais ils sont trop peu, et les étrangers trop nombreux.

languages.text: Çekiç Tarikatı'ndaki yoldaşları, öne çıkarak yabancıları karşıladı. Yanlarında su, protein erzakları, şifalı otlar ve prometyum hazneleri taşıyorlardı. Kalabalık ise yiyecekler için birbirine girdi, kan döküldü, birçoğu izdiham sırasında ezildi ve yaralandı. Ezilip yaralananlardan bazıları da manastır ahalisindendi.
languages.original_text: The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer came forth to meet the strangers, carrying water and protein victuals and medicinal herbs and jugs of promethium. But the crowd came to blows over viands, and blood was spilt, and many were trampled or mauled in the stampede, some of them dwellers of the monastery.

traits.locale_text: Çekiç Tarikatı'ndaki yoldaşları, öne çıkarak yabancıları karşıladı. Yanlarında su, protein erzakları, şifalı otlar ve prometyum hazneleri taşıyorlardı. Kalabalık ise yiyecekler için birbirine girdi, kan döküldü, birçoğu izdiham sırasında ezildi ve yaralandı. Ezilip yaralananlardan bazıları da manastır ahalisindendi.
